movie.title: Crystal City
movie.description_intro: New York City's LGBTQ community is experiencing a resurgence of crystal methamphetamine addiction. "Crystal City" explores the epidemic through the eyes of recovering addicts as they attempt to overcome their chemical dependency.
movie.description_full: New York City's LGBTQ community is experiencing a resurgence of crystal methamphetamine addiction. "Crystal City" explores the epidemic through the eyes of recovering addicts as they attempt to overcome their chemical dependency.

movies.title: An Alternative Reality: The Football Manager Documentary
movies.title_english: An Alternative Reality: The Football Manager Documentary
movies.title_long: An Alternative Reality: The Football Manager Documentary (2014)
movies.summary: Featuring contributions from some of Football Manager?s creators and famous fans from the worlds of football and entertainment, 'An Alternative Reality: The Football Manager Documentary' will examine the game?s enduring appeal and how it has seeped into and influenced the culture of the world?s favourite game.
movies.description_full: Featuring contributions from some of Football Manager?s creators and famous fans from the worlds of football and entertainment, 'An Alternative Reality: The Football Manager Documentary' will examine the game?s enduring appeal and how it has seeped into and influenced the culture of the world?s favourite game.

movies.title: Rising Phoenix
movies.summary: The history and current standing of the Paralympic Games, which has grown to become the world's third largest sporting event.
movies.description_full: The history and current standing of the Paralympic Games, which has grown to become the world's third largest sporting event.
movies.synopsis: The history and current standing of the Paralympic Games, which has grown to become the world's third largest sporting event.

movies.title: The Art of Political Murder
movies.summary: An investigation into the truth behind the murder of Guatemalan Bishop, Juan Gerardi, who was killed in 1998 just days after trying to hold the country's military accountable for the atrocities committed during its civil war.
movies.description_full: An investigation into the truth behind the murder of Guatemalan Bishop, Juan Gerardi, who was killed in 1998 just days after trying to hold the country's military accountable for the atrocities committed during its civil war.
movies.synopsis: An investigation into the truth behind the murder of Guatemalan Bishop, Juan Gerardi, who was killed in 1998 just days after trying to hold the country's military accountable for the atrocities committed during its civil war.

movies.title: Rebuilding Paradise
movies.summary: The community of Paradise, California, a town in the Sierra Nevada foothills, attempts to rebuild after devastating wildfires in 2018.
movies.description_full: The community of Paradise, California, a town in the Sierra Nevada foothills, attempts to rebuild after devastating wildfires in 2018.
